channel.title: Help!
channel.description: iv added dragon fullhelm to my server.. added this to item.cfg: [code]item = 15195 dragon_full_helm A_silabsoft_Item. 150 150 150 50 50 50 50 50 100 100 100 100 100 5 2[/code] in item.java i added at fullhelms: 15195 do i have to do anything ells before i can use the item? couse when i try loggin in it says something about the item handler then load item list? please help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @souleroo souleroo
item.description:
